definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
12th earthly branch: 9-11 p.m., 10th solar month (7th November-6th December), year of the Boar/ancient Chinese compass point: 330°
erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
erhua variant of 小孩[xiao3 hai2]

sentences.english: As the musicians struck up, the wicker husband and the ugly girl went to dance.
sentences.chinese: 樂師們在演奏，柳條丈夫和醜女孩翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: When the day came, the ugly girl knocked on the basket-maker's door.
sentences.chinese: 到約定時間時，醜女孩敲開了制籃商的門。

sentences.english: I'm a kid in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 皒昰一個在夏天魡孩孖。

sentences.english: The others agreed and they all began to dig hard in the sand.
sentences.chinese: 別的孩於同意了，他們就都起勁地挖起沙來。

sentences.english: Her daughter is blossoming into a beautiful girl.
sentences.chinese: 她兒出落一個美麗的孩。

sentences.english: In the garden, wreathed in filth, stood the ugly girl, cuddling a child.
sentences.chinese: 在髒亂的花園裏站着醜女孩，抱着一個孩子。

definition: paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
